CustomField.description: Controls how the agent responds when a tool fails. Autonomous: all errors flow to the LLM, which decides whether and how to recover (subject to the global MaxToolRetries safety ceiling). Fail Fast: halt immediately on any tool failure with no LLM recovery attempt.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Autonomous (default): LLM decides recovery. Fail Fast: stop execution on first tool error.
CustomField.label: Error Recovery Mode
